languages.text: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer's HP is less than 50%, every second attack against them is automatically dodged for 2 rounds.

languages.text: Cuando el portador tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, cada segundo ataque que recibe es {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivado{/g} automáticamente. El efecto dura hasta 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador tiene menos del 50 % de sus heridas, cada segundo ataque que recibe es {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivado{/g} automáticamente. El efecto dura hasta 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者の傷が50%未満の場合、使用者への攻撃を2回に1回自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。この効果は最大2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}継続する。
languages.original_text: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の傷が50%未満の場合、使用者への攻撃を2回に1回自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。この効果は最大2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}継続する。

languages.text: 当装备者的生命值低于50%时，针对装备者的每两次攻击都会被自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，此效果最多持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的生命值低于50%时，针对装备者的每两次攻击都会被自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，此效果最多持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Lorsque le porteur a moins de 50 % de blessures, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement les deuxièmes attaques de ses adversaires. Cet effet dure jusqu'à 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le porteur a moins de 50 % de blessures, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement les deuxièmes attaques de ses adversaires. Cet effet dure jusqu'à 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Hat der Träger weniger als 50 % Wunden, kann er jedem zweiten Angriff automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}. Dieser Effekt dauert bis zu 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} an.
languages.original_text: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger weniger als 50 % Wunden, kann er jedem zweiten Angriff automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}. Dieser Effekt dauert bis zu 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} an.

languages.text: Пока у персонажа меньше 50% здоровья, он автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от каждой второй атаки. Эффект длится не дольше 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, sağlık puanı %50'nin altına inmişse kendisine yapılan her ikinci saldırıdan otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}. Etkisi en fazla 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
